Articles.Content: I have updated to new 1.05 and just started a new game. I did a two stage airframe with parachute on my booster and chute on pod/nosecone. After launch I went to recovery and once I clicked recover on the second object, "debris" i am stuck in the world view with no options and saving and re-entering i'm still stuck in the recovery view. Any suggestions?

I'm having trouble understanding exactly what you're seeing. Can you not return to the space center?

As for what could be causing it: no idea, what mods are you running?
